description: On October 9, 2022, astronomers detected GRB 221009A, the most powerful gamma-ray burst ever recorded, earning the nickname “BOAT” (Brightest Of All Time). This rare, once-in-10,000-year event came from a galaxy 2 billion light-years away and temporarily blinded gamma-ray detectors. It revealed new insights into stellar death, as the associated supernova (SN 2022xiw) was initially hidden by the burst’s brilliance. Using Fermi and the James Webb Space Telescope, scientists detected unique signals like electron-positron annihilation but no heavy elements, challenging assumptions about how such elements are created in stellar explosions and refining GRB and black hole models.
title: Brightest Gamma-Ray Burst Ever Observed Reveals Cosmic Secrets

description: Astronomers discovered a rogue planet hidden in Hubble’s archival data using gravitational microlensing based on Einstein’s theory. The event, OGLE-2023-BLG-0524, lasted just eight hours and lacked signs of a host star, suggesting the planet might be truly free-floating.
title: New Rogue Planet Discovered in Hubble Data Using Einstein’s Gravity Theory

description: The Weather satellite has recently detected the record-breaking megaflash that appeared in the year 2017 and has surpassed the record of the 477-mile lightning bolt, which occurred in 2020. The new world record holder for the lightning bolt stretched 515 miles long, measuring Texas to Missouri.
title: New World Record Alert: Weather Satellite Records Longest Lightning Flash of 515 Miles

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival is underway and there are several deals on smartphones, tablets, laptops, and more from top brands to pick from. In addition to these discounts, you can also exchange your old devices for even bigger savings. Meanwhile, eligible credit card offers can further slash costs while making purchases. Popular picks like Apple's iPhone 15, MacBook Air (M1), iPad Air (M3), AirPods, Samsung Galaxy Z Fold series smartphones, and OnePlus 13 are discounted during the sale, alongside gaming laptops from HP, Lenovo, Asus, and Acer.
title: Amazon Freedom Sale 2025 Highlights: Best Offers on Smart TVs, Apple Devices, Appliances and More on Day 2

description: During Apple's Q3 2025 earnings call, Apple CEO Tim Cook announced that the company plans to open additional retail stores in both India and the United Arab Emirates before the end of the year. Cook did not disclose exact opening dates, locations, or additional details about the upcoming stores.
title: Apple Plans to Open New Retail Stores in India and the UAE, Says Tim Cook

description: Elon Musk's brain implant company Neuralink said on Thursday it will launch a clinical study in Great Britain to test how its chips can enable patients with severe paralysis to control digital and physical tools with their thoughts.
title: Elon Musk's Neuralink to Test Brain Chips in Clinical Study in Great Britain

description: The San Francisco-based 9th US Circuit Court of Appeals, in a unanimous ruling, rejected claims from Google that the trial judge made legal errors in the antitrust case that unfairly benefited "Fortnite" maker Epic Games, which filed the lawsuit in 2020.
title: Google Loses US Appeal Over App Store Reforms in Epic Games Case

description: Strong results from Microsoft and Meta Platforms late on Thursday also fueled gains in Amazon and sent chipmaker Nvidia to a record high, with the four heavyweight AI players gaining over half a trillion dollars in market value.
title: Microsoft Reaches $4 Trillion Valuation After Solid Results

description: A tipster claims the Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge may feature a 4,400mAh battery, though earlier reports suggested a 4,200mAh cell.  The phone is expected to be slimmer than the Galaxy S25 Edge, which measures 5.8mm in thickness. It may use new battery material technology, possibly a silicon-carbon cell. It is also likely to include a 50-megapixel ultra-wide camera, upgrading from the S25 Edge’s 12-megapixel sensor.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge Tipped to Pack a Larger 4,400mAh Battery

description: Nintendo sold more than six million units of the Switch 2 in the seven weeks following its June launch, the gaming company said on Friday, pointing to strong early demand. The company provided the early sales volumes in an earnings update and said it was keeping its forecast of selling 15 million Switch 2 units in the financial year ending March 2026.
title: Switch 2 Has Sold 6 Million Units Since Launch, Nintendo Confirms

description: Telegram has announced the rollout of its app version 11.14.0, which brings a slew of new features to Android and iOS users. While iOS users can download the app through the App Store, Android users have a choice of either downloading it from the Play Store or getting an APK from the official Telegram website.
title: Telegram Update Adds Public Post Search and Other New Features on Android, iOS

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 enters its second day as the e-commerce giant brings more deals and discounts on its wide range of product listings. The sale first went live for Prime subscribers at midnight on July 31, and 12 hours later, it was opened to all users. Currently, the platform offers price cuts on home appliances ranging from smart TVs, air conditioners, microwave ovens, robot vacuum cleaners, and more.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Top Deals on Washing Machines

description: Amazon’s Great Freedom Festival 2025 sale began at midnight on July 31 for Prime members and at 12pm for all users. SBI credit card holders get an instant 10 percent discount, while select bank users can avail up to Rs. 2,000 cashback. After highlighting top deals on home appliances and personal gadgets, we have compiled a list of exciting tablet offers that you can currently grab. The 11-inch iPad Air with M3 is available for Rs. 48,900, alongside the OnePlus Pad 2 at Rs. 36,249 and more.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Tablets

description: Amazon’s Great Freedom Festival 2025 is currently live in India, offering discounts across various categories. The discount sale brings up to 75 off on vacuum cleaners. Companies like Eureka Forbes, Dreame, and Philips are selling their products at discounted rates in the sale.  Users can take advantage of bank offers, exchange discounts and additional coupon-based offers.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Vacuum Cleaners

description: Apple reported $94.04 billion in revenue for its fiscal third quarter ended on June 28, up nearly 10 percent from a year earlier and beating analyst expectations of $89.54 billion, according to LSEG data. Its earnings per share of $1.57 topped expectations for $1.43 per share.
title: Apple Revenue Forecast Beats Estimates, Tariff Costs Projected at $1.1 Billion

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 has entered its second day. The sale, which is being hosted on the occasion of India's annual Independence Day celebration on August 15, went live on Thursday at noon for all users of the platform. It offers discounts on a wide range of products, including smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, earphones, washing machines, smart TVs, laptops, and more.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Air Conditioners

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025 is the e-commerce giant's Independence Day-themed sale event. It began on July 31, offering customers an opportunity to get their hands on the products in their wishlist. If a proper home theatre system is what you’re after, then there are some great deals currently live on them which we have listed down below. You can avail of discounts of up to 60 percent on home theatre systems, among other offers.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Home Theatre Systems

description: Refrigerators are available with up to 55 percent off in the Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025 sale. Top brands like Samsung and LG are selling their latest models at attractive rates. Several products are offered with no-cost EMI plans, coupon-based discounts, and exchange offers. Buyers can also get bank offers.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Refrigerators

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 started on July 31 at midnight for Prime subscribers, and at noon for others. While the sale event is live, people can grab the best deals on power banks from various brands with discounts of up to Rs. 8,000.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Power Banks From Xiaomi, Ambrane, and More

description: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy shared plans to introduce advertisements when users chat with Alexa+. The Seattle-based tech giant unveiled the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered version of Alexa voice assistant in February, which comes with several new capabilities. Currently available in the US, the company claims it has been rolled out to and is being used by millions of users.
title: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy Wants to Place Advertisements in Multiturn Conversations With Alexa+

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025 started on July 31 at 12pm, with early access for Prime members. Top wearable brands like Sony, Sennheiser, Boat, and JBL are offering significant discounts on over-ear headphones. Buyers can also benefit from extra savings through coupons, bank discounts, exchange offers, and SBI card deals. Highlight deals include the Sony WH-1000XM5 at Rs. 25,989 and the Sennheiser Momentum 4 at Rs. 21,990. Budget options like Boat Rockerz 551 ANC Pro are also available at discounted rates.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Headphones

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 started on August 31 at midnight for Prime subscribers, and at noon for others. While the sale event is live, people can get their hands on the best electronics from reputed brands across product categories and price ranges.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Bluetooth Speakers From Bose, Marshall, JBL, and More

description: Square Enix announced two new RPGs at the Nintendo Direct: Partner Showcase presentation on Thursday. The first, Octopath Traveler 0, will launch in December, while the second, The Adventures of Elliot: The Millennium Tales, will arrive next year.
title: Square Enix Announces Octopath Traveler 0 at Nintendo Direct, Launch Set for December
Flipkart Freedom Sale: Top Tablet Deals You Shouldn’t Miss

description: Vivo V60 was recently spotted on the NBTC website with model number V2511. The listing suggests 5G connectivity on the phone. It is scheduled to be launched in India on August 12.  It is confirmed to feature a 6,500mAh battery, a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset and a 50-megapixel telephoto shooter
title: Vivo V60 5G Bags NBTC Certification Ahead of August 12 India Launch

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 has entered its second day in India. The e-commerce giant has introduced lucrative deals on a wide range of products across categories. If a value-for-money mid-range smartphone is on your shopping list, then our latest article comprises the best deals on smartphones under Rs. 30,000.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Smartphones Under Rs. 30,000

description: OnePlus 11 5G was launched in India in February 2023. Now, the phone has started receiving the new OxygenOS 15 update in India. It brings a slew of new features like Mind Space and camera improvements, along with the latest Android security patch. It also fixes a display location issue with mini windows, the company said. The smartphone features a triple rear camera setup with a 50-megapixel primary shooter. It is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 SoC.
title: OnePlus 11 5G Gets New OxygenOS 15 Update in India With New Features, Latest Security Patch

description: The Vivo V60 5G is set to launch in India on August 12 at 12pm IST and will be available in Auspicious Gold, Mist Grey, and Moonlit Blue shades. It will feature a quad-curved display, a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 SoC, and a 6,500mAh battery. The phone will offer a Zeiss-backed 50-megapixel telephoto camera with 10x zoom and multifocal portrait modes. Running Android 15-based FuntouchOS 15, it will include Gemini AI features and boast IP68 and IP69 dust and water resistance ratings.
title: Vivo V60 5G India Launch Date Set for August 12; Colour Options and Key Features Revealed

description: ChatGPT has a feature that allows users to create a URL of their conversation with the chatbot and share it with friends or colleagues. As per a report, some of these shared conversations were discoverable when running a query on search engines such as Google Search, Bing, or DuckDuckGo. To see these conversations, one reportedly needs to filter the search results to a specific ChatGPT domain.
title: ChatGPT’s Shared Conversations Were Reportedly Discoverable on Google Search, OpenAI Calls It Experiment

description: BSNL has launched a new prepaid recharge plan for users in India for a limited time. The state-owned telecom operator made the announcement via its social media handle on Thursday while providing more details about what this Independence Day-themed prepaid recharge plan offers. Dubbed Freedom Offer, it provides consumers with 2GB of 4G data per day, unlimited calls, along with other benefits at Re 1.
title: BSNL Freedom Offer With 2GB Daily Data, Unlimited Calls for 30 Days Announced

description: Samsung Exynos 2600 SoC could launch soon as a sequel to the Exynos 2500. The South Korean giant has now revealed the process node for the upcoming chipset. The new chipset will be built on Samsung's 2nm GAA process. It is likely to be used in next year's Galaxy S26 series.
title: Samsung Exynos 2600 Confirmed to Be the First Chipset Built on 2nm GAA Process

description: EA fully revealed Battlefield 6 at a global event on Thursday, taking covers off the game's multiplayer maps, modes, and class and combat systems. The publisher also shared and extended look at gameplay and confirmed the release date and pricing for the military shooter.
title: Battlefield 6 Multiplayer and Gameplay Revealed, Launch Set for October 10

description: The Google Pixel Watch 4 will reportedly start at $349 (roughly Rs. 30,500) for the 41mm Wi-Fi model, while the LTE version of the same size is expected to cost $399 (roughly Rs. 34,800). The 45mm variants will likely be priced at $399 (roughly Rs. 34,800) for Wi-Fi and $449 (roughly Rs. 39,200) for LTE. Buyers will likely receive six months of Fitbit Premium and one month of YouTube Premium for free. The charging speed of the watch is expected to improve significantly.
title: Google Pixel Watch 4 Price, Launch Offers and Charging Speed Tipped

description: Following its launch a few days ago, the Lava Blaze Dragon 5G is now available for interested customers. The smartphone is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC, coupled with 4GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage. It features a 50-megapixel AI-powered rear camera. At the front, it comes with an 8-megapixel selfie shooter. The handset is available in two colour options.
title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G With a 5,000mAh Battery Goes on Sale in India: Price, Offers

description: Apple CEO Tim Cook reportedly highlighted that the company is planning to “significantly” increase investments in artificial intelligence (AI) technology. The statements were made on Thursday as part of the CEO's remarks alongside Apple’s third-quarter earnings report. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant is also open to the merger and acquisition route to catch up in the AI race.
title: Apple CEO Tim Cook ‘Very Open’ to AI Acquisitions, Plans to Increase Investments: Report

description: Infinix announced the launch of the Infinix GT 30 5G+ in India via press release. The exact launch date is still under wraps, but the teaser images shared by the brand show the design of the soon-to-be-unveiled phone. It is shown in a green shade with a Cyber Mecha Design 2.0, resembling the Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G. It features customisable white LED lighting on the rear panel.
title: Infinix GT 30 5G+ Confirmed to Launch in India Soon; Cyber Mecha Design 2.0 Teased

description: Leaked design render of the Google Pixel Buds 2a show the earbuds in an Iris shade. The headsets may be available in additional colour options like Fog Light, Strawberry, and Hazel. The upcoming TWS earphones are said to deliver improved battery life and better sound quality over the current Pixel Buds A-Series. Google may also bundle the Buds 2a with Pixel 10 series phone pre-orders in select markets, including the UK and Europe.
title: Google Pixel Buds 2a Renders Leaked; Said to Offer Improved Battery Life

description: Apple reported its fiscal earnings for the third quarter (Q3) 2025 on Thursday and among the highlights was one major milestone revelation. In a call to investors, CEO Tim Cook revealed that the Cupertino-based tech giant recently shipped its three-billionth iPhone since the launch of the first model in 2007. Estimates reveal that it might have taken Apple less than five years to go from shipping two billion to three billion iPhone units.
title: Apple Has Shipped 3 Billion iPhone Units Since Launch in 2007, Says CEO Tim Cook

description: DJI Osmo 360 was launched in India and the global markets on Thursday. The action camera comes with a 1-inch 360-degree sensor which allows it to natively record videos in up to 8K resolution. It has also been equipped with a square HDR Image sensor which is said to be an industry-first innovation. As per the company, the DJI Osmo 360 has 128GB of built-in storage, Wi-Fi 6, and gesture support.
title: DJI Osmo 360 Launched in India With Native 8K Video Recording, 1-inch 360-Degree Imaging

description: The Vivo X200 FE has a premium design and a sleek profile. The handset packs a vivid 6.77-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display with good viewing angles. The handset also comes with a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro processor capable of delivering good performance. The phone also features a triple-camera setup that delivers good results in various lighting conditions. The device also features a large 5,000mAh battery and comes loaded with 33W fast charging support.
title: Vivo X200 FE Review: Come for Compact Design, Stay for Camera

description: With the weekend approaching, the top OTT platforms are ready with a new set of releases. The top releases include Sitaare Zameen Par, Housefull 5, Chief of War, and more. There will be a blend of drama, humor, action, comedy, and reality. Watch them now only on Netflix, Zee 5, Sony LIV, etc.
title: OTT Releases This Week (July 28 - August 2): Housefull 5, Sitaare Zameen Par, Thammudu, Chief of War, and More
